I know you going to calm down and return..just take your time and come back=
 when 
your ready..we both no in a strange way you enjoy FB just like i do =
with all its 
drama and everything else..beside what would we do without yo=
u and you lovely 
bread and food pics?..so just relax..and come back soon

=
Ursy

 For anybo=
dy that was on my FB friends--I dumped Fb after yet someone else that

ed to be starting the same incessant arguements, how dare I disagree! I'm 
=

host 
hunter community, can't say how the box works, can't say how stupid m=
ost 
people's percerption of spirit is--I'm over it! 

 
Frank-S
